meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Brad Rutter Watson Ken Jennings Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6088.

td.p: Brad Rutter, a $3.2-million winner from Los Angeles, California (subtotal of $10,400)
Watson, a deep question answering system from IBM (subtotal of $35,734)
Ken Jennings, a 74-game champion from Seattle, Washington (subtotal of $4,800)

tr.td: EU, THE EUROPEAN UNION
ACTORS WHO DIRECT
DIALING FOR DIALECTS
BREAKING NEWS
ONE BUCK OR LESS
ALSO ON YOUR COMPUTER KEYS

(lock challenge)

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [*], the author of Dracula.)
...
[Laughter after Ken\'s reveal]
...
[Much cheering after Watson\'s reveal]
...
(Alex: Watson was created by some very talented people. And on the subject of talented people, I invite you to join us tomorrow on Jeopardy! as we present some very talented young people--our annual Teen Tournament. Till then, so long, everybody.)
BradWho is Bram Stoker?
$5,600
KenWho is Stoker? (I for one welcome our new computer overlords)
$1,000
WatsonWho is Bram Stoker?
$17,973
Bram Stoker')
